dcterms:description: The n2c2 obesity dataset contains test and training documents of patients' clinical records, which have been anonymized. It includes various morbidity classes such as Asthma, CAD, CHF, Depression, Diabetes, Gallstones, GERD, Gout, Hypercholesterolemia, Hypertension, Hypertriglyceridemia, OA, Obesity, OSA, PVD, and Venous Insufficiency. Each clinical note is associated with intuitive and textual labels indicating the presence of specific morbidities.
dcterms:title: n2c2 obesity data
